transform.h¶

Overview¶

Related Modules:

Graphic

Description:

Provides functions to transform components, points, and line segments, including rotation and scaling.

Since:

1.0

Version:

1.0

Summary¶

Data Structures¶

Data Structure Name

Description

OHOS::TransformMap

Transforms a rectangle, including rotation and scaling.

Description
